content: Black Myth: Wukong throws you into the action with only a brief tutorial. So, to help you understand some of the game mechanics and features, we've compiled a list of handy beginner tips and tricks, as well as things that the game doesn't explain to you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Myth_Wukong_Guide.md', within the main section titled 'Black Myth: Wukong Wiki Sections', specifically from the subsection 'Beginner's Guide and Getting Started'.
The content is as follows:
Black Myth: Wukong throws you into the action with only a brief tutorial. So, to help you understand some of the game mechanics and features, we've compiled a list of handy beginner tips and tricks, as well as things that the game doesn't explain to you.
